title: What Does UK Entering Recession After Steeper-Than-Expected Fall In GDP Mean For Brits
description: While recessions of the past, notably during the global financial crisis of 2008-2009, were protracted and severe, indications suggest that this downturn may be milder and short-lived.

title: Lib Dems call for extra £1bn for farming budget in bid to win rural votes

title: Rishi Sunak's surprise Devon visit sparks plea
description: A surprise visit from the Prime Minister has sparked a renewed call for action on Cullompton's transport woes. Mid Devon Liberal Democrats are urging the Government to honour its pledges of funding for the town's relief road, Junction 28 and train station, following a public consultation that showed overwhelming support for the projects.

title: Rishi Sunak to announce £427m farming support package in speech to National Farmers' Union
description: Rishi Sunak is set to pledge he will "never take our food security for granted" as he outlines support for farmers in a speech to the sector. Speaking to the National Farmers' Union conference on Tuesday, the Prime Minister is expected to say the Government will "be by their side" as farming goes through its biggest change in a generation.

Further details fleshing out the pilot scheme will be announced in due course.
